sentence.Network_en: My shoes removed, I entered a low - ceilinged room, treading cautiously on the soft tatami matting.
sentence.Network_cn: 我脱掉鞋子后, 走进一间屋顶很低的房间, 小心翼翼地踩在柔软的塌塌米垫子上.

sentence.Network_en: Solid low-level waste will be disposed of deep underground.
sentence.Network_cn: 放射性水平低的固体废料将做地下深埋处理。

sentence.Network_en: Doctor believed that his low sperm count was the problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生认为他的精子数太低是问题所在。

means.word_mean: 1. having a lower than normal ceiling
